general_info.summary: This text provides a link to the Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com) program in International Accounting and Finance at Sharda University, suggesting it details the curriculum, admission criteria, and career prospects for this specialized business degree.

career_path.summary: This text outlines the career opportunities available after completing a course, highlighting the potential to apply for over 500 jobs with well-known companies. It lists specific job roles such as Auditor & Tax Consultant, Financial Planning and Analysis, Forensic Accountant, and Compliance and Risk Manager, and notes that students are typically placed with an average annual package of 4 LPA to 6 LPA.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
Students can apply for over 500 jobs with reputed companies like KPMG, PwC, EY, Deloitte, Grant Thompson, TATA Communications, Embassy Group, American Express, etc.
Some Job Roles for ACCA Candidates:
• Auditor & Tax Consultant
• Financial Planning and Analysis
• Forensic Accountant
• Compliance and Risk Manager
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4 LPA to 6 LPA.
Take the next step towards a career in management.
• Recruiters
